block.p: Recent Sale $5.3 million 160 East 23rd Street (between Lexington and Third Avenues) Manhattan A developer has bought this vacant two-story building on a 2,469- square-foot lot with at least 18,022 buildable square feet. Seller: Sandy Squitieri Buyer: Frank Ng Broker: John Ciraulo, Massey Knakal Realty Services

Recent Lease $100/sq. ft. approximate annual rent $385,000 21-23 West Eighth Street (between Fifth Avenue and Avenue of the Americas) Manhattan A barbecue restaurant has taken 3,850 square feet, with basement space, that it plans to renovate in this prewar five-story walk-up in Greenwich Village. Tenant: BBQ Landlord: Tzong Yip Jean Broker: Lydia Wong, Buchbinder & Warren Realty Group L.L.C.

For Lease $12/sq. ft. approximate annual rent $976,000 280 Wilson Avenue Newark This 81,326-square-foot warehouse, with refrigeration areas and drains, is available for food manufacturing or distribution. It sits on a four-acre site, with about two acres of parking. Owner: Pantheon Properties Broker: Gary Capetta, Pantheon Properties
